name: Joshua
description: Moses's successor who conquered the Promised Land. Military genius, faithful servant who became leader. 'Be strong and courageous.'

sword-raised-jericho.name: At Jericho's Walls
sword-raised-jericho.description: Sword raised as walls of Jericho fall
sword-raised-jericho.prompt: standing with sword raised as walls crumble behind - dust and debris falling, face showing triumphant faith, unconventional victory through obedience, the walls fall flat

commanding-sun.name: Commanding the Sun
commanding-sun.description: Arm raised commanding sun to stand still
commanding-sun.prompt: arm raised toward sky commanding sun to stop - bold expression, speaking to creation itself, the day God listened to a man's voice, audacious faith in battle

leading-army.name: Leading Israel's Army
leading-army.description: At head of troops marching into battle
leading-army.prompt: leading army into battle - sword drawn, confident stride, troops following, the military leader who conquered the land, decisive commander

crossing-jordan.name: Crossing the Jordan
crossing-jordan.description: Leading Israel across the parted Jordan
crossing-jordan.expression: new beginning, following in Moses's footsteps
crossing-jordan.prompt: leading people across parted Jordan river - priests with ark ahead, people following, entering the Promised Land, new chapter beginning

choose-this-day.name: Choose This Day
choose-this-day.description: Challenging Israel to commit to the LORD
choose-this-day.prompt: standing before assembled Israel with arm raised in challenge - passionate expression, calling for decision, 'as for me and my house, we will serve the LORD'

spy-mission.name: Faithful Spy
spy-mission.description: Young Joshua returning from spying the land
spy-mission.prompt: standing with Caleb against the ten other spies - minority report, confident expression, 'we are well able to take it', courage against fearful majority
